description.displayText:
To Whomever it may concern

Judi has been the after school nanny for the past year and a half for our twin 8 year old daughters. Judi is a reliable & hard working individual. She has brought a thoughtful, organized and thoroughly professional approach in taking care of our girls. One of our daughters has developmental needs and Judi has been able to provide individualized care for her. Judi picks them up after school and drives them to different after school activities every day. In addition, Judi helped care for the girls over summer as well. We highly recommend Judi for all childcare needs.

description.displayText: Judi was very child focused, dependable, and attentive.  I am happy to recommend Judi as a Child Care Provider.  Judi was our child care provider for several years and our children have nothing but the fondest memories of her.  She took an active role in enhancing the children's education.  Judi was very safety conscious when transporting my children from school and activities.
